5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Sa’eed and ‘Abdullah bin ‘Amr bin ‘As that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:“Do not prepare a mount (travel) to visit any mosque except three: the Sacred Mosque, Aqsa Mosque, and this mosque of mine.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الصَّلاَةِ فِي مَسْجِدِ بَيْتِ الْمَقْدِسِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning praying in the Mosque of Baitil-Maqdis (Jerusalem)
